feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.14.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Added MangaUpdates as a source for manga (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/75e496ae893cbca5733258d64d7aba0dc25ac2a5)
  • Added import from Kitsu (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c8b418e5382f4937b4ae9bea918b301d87e55e7a)
  • Added import from Trakt (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/848d6a58f356c4e1a9b3e83148fbc803a4d01dc9)

Fixes

  • Fix fetching anime with a discontinued status (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a9b1768a64b2e3ea6ffb0cdcf358c23ea39de555)
  • Fix cache management for TMDB requests (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/f664bb78e9e141b2920b4e2ec695075fbd60f73b)

Other

  • Mark tv show as completed if last episode is watched (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a4bd1d2289c92498f2ebe0f4605151bba5f2a2ad)
  • Optimize the generation of calendar events (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/73aa0561dd1e316d6c4bc18bdb8760daf73faa4d)
  • Improved the performance when using SQLite (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/95fd4834239761feb18995c59a0d2eba0d7e118d)
  • Added better rate limit management (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/d6cc551c374bd657b2ecb953fd1e7d1c84240e51)

Maintenance

  • Bump gunicorn from 22.0.0 to 23.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/207
  • Bump django-crispy-forms from 2.1 to 2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/208
  • Bump coverage from 7.6.0 to 7.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/209
  • Bump redis[hiredis] from 5.0.4 to 5.0.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/210
  • Bump ruff from 0.5.5 to 0.6.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/222

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.13.1...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.14.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed bug when trakt gives invalid tmdb ids when importing (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/022d0b0562611b7a546c5f503c2c440f48a2c57f)

Other

  • Improved the text formatting of task results (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/1cb38ea0ce79e45a79f45f687aa860cbf1301f2d)
  • Added logging for the calendar event task (add logging for event calendar taks)
  • Added better messages for import errors (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/2f4adbf65a440b1898210b8f657f83b7e43f6812)

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.14.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed appropriate marking of a season status to repeating when importing from trakt (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/51c06d7c752a6bde0e283177b577189c0c0fe258)

Maintenance

  • Bump django-model-utils from 4.5.1 to 5.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/227
  • Bump aiohttp from 3.10.5 to 3.10.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.14.1...v0.14.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.14.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed not being able to edit from the media list view (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/eb9ed84bdf1e3095756ecb052cb2ddd0ca6a4995)
  • Fixed not being able to go to the detail page of a MangaUpdates manga from the media list view. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/eb9ed84bdf1e3095756ecb052cb2ddd0ca6a4995)

Maintenance

  • Bump fakeredis from 2.24.1 to 2.25.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/228
  • Bump djlint from 1.34.1 to 1.35.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/225
  • Bump psycopg[binary] from 3.2.1 to 3.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/224

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.14.2...v0.14.3

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.14.4
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed not being able to track manga from MangaUpdates whose chapter count is not up to date (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/10a31577051465aabc085faa71993cad24a9dc8b)
  • Fixed creation of seasons with a wrong title when creating it by viewing episodes (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/6c9b58f723694238730db2ff821903f3bf7160b1)

Other

  • Added tooltips for some imports on how to find slugs/ids for certain sources (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/018b3242440d8c7206280df3d8667dd4d33519ab)

Maintenance

  • Bump redis[hiredis] from 5.0.8 to 5.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/232
  • Bump django from 5.1 to 5.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/231

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.14.3...v0.14.4
